[url]https://www.dailymotion.com/user/Hot564231/video/x9otmg_where-the-black-mesa-things-are_fun[/url]

Also, here the original trailer if you like to know

item.title: Where the Black Mesa Things Are
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
John Killer118:

When all you have is football training, you would have alot of time on your hands.
Plus, most of that 16 hours could of been just me logged onto the fourm but not actually “on” it.

That didn’t really make sense. At all.

Your “football training” doesn’t take any time, you’re saying?

And that 16 hours is how much game time you’ve had in the past 2 weeks, not your forum time, lul. It is your own signature, you know.

Read full topic
item.source: Where the Black Mesa Things Are

As you were saying.

When all you have is football training, you would have alot of time on your hands.
Plus, most of that 16 hours could of been just me logged onto the fourm but not actually “on” it.
Also, where did you get that information?

item.title: Where the Black Mesa Things Are
item.dc:creator: FyBe
item.description:
Kaze:

“johnkiller118
15.9 hours the past 2 weeks”

As you were saying.

how do you find that?

My 21" monitor does the job

sersoft:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wCF3ywukQYA&NR=1

Shoes.

hey dude congratulations on your brand new VHS tape.

lol now that you said it…

Well, I PM’d Jambo to say why he hasn’t said anything, been a day now and I’ve seen him post in the forum today, so I can see he won’t even give me the decently of a reply, isn’t the first time he done this though.

item.title: Where the Black Mesa Things Are
item.dc:creator: Grand_General_Hot
item.description:
raw_bean:

It’s his dream, surely: Ram whisking him off to a fantasy land.

Wearing his Joker makeup and pink glasses while having showers with Ram.

John Killer118:

You have waaaaaaaaayyyyy too much time on your hands.

Sadly I don’t, that took me 4 days of breaks and free time gaps to make. if I had “waaaaaaaaayyyyy too much time on my hands” there would alot more married with black mesa & black mesa lost.
